Element.Name: UBL version identifier
Element.Description: Identifies the version of syntax that transactions are based on.

Element.Name: Customization identifier
Element.Description: Identifies the specification of content and rules that apply to the transaction.

Element.Name: Profile identifier
Element.Description: Identifies the business process context in which the transaction appears.

Element.Name: Reminder number
Element.Description: A number that uniquely define the reminder.

Element.Name: Reminder date
Element.Description: The date on when the reminder was issued. (YYYY-MM-DD)

Element.Name: Reminder type code
Element.Description: A code signifying the type of the reminder.

Element.Name: Reminder sequence number
Element.Description: The number of the current reminder in the sequence of reminders related to the specified payment, i.e. the number of reminders previously sent plus one.

Element.Name: Reminder date
Element.Description: Free-form text to this reminder.

Element.Name: Supplier
Element.Description: The organization or person that deliver a item or service.

Element.Name: Supplier
Element.Description: An association to a supplier.

Element.Name: Endpoint identifier
Element.Description: An identifier indicating the suppliers electronic address for their messaging. The identifier must be entered as a numerical code according to ISO6523 and consists of one prefix. The prefix specifies the issuer of the identifier, and the actual identifier.

Element.Name: Trader identifier
Element.Description: The identification of a trader.

Element.Name: Trader identifier
Element.Description: Identifies the trader. One should enter the identification system when using this element.

Element.Name: Trader name
Element.Description: Must enter trader name.

Element.Name: Name
Element.Description: The supplier's name.

Element.Name: Address
Element.Description: Trader's address.

Element.Name: Address identifier
Element.Description: Identifies a specific address within a system of registered addresses. One should enter the identification system when using this element.

Element.Name: Postbox
Element.Description: A post office box number registered for postal delivery.

Element.Name: Street name
Element.Description: The name of a street or road.

Element.Name: Street number
Element.Description: The number of the street or road.

Element.Name: Post location
Element.Description: The post location of a city, town, or village.

Element.Name: Post code
Element.Description: The postal number for this address, such as zip code or post code.

Element.Name: Country subentity
Element.Description: The division of a country in which this address is located, such as the name of its county, province or state.

Element.Name: Country
Element.Description: The country in which this address is situated.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: A code signifying this country, and based on ISO3166-1. The code should be entered for the customer(CustomerParty) and the supplier (SupplierParty), to avoid warning messages from Schematron.

Element.Name: Supplier organization number
Element.Description: Identifies the suppliers organization number through a national register (Brønnøysundregister).

Element.Name: Organization name
Element.Description: The name of the supplier's as registered with the specified organization number.

Element.Name: Organization number
Element.Description: The supplier's organization number. For norwegian suppliers: only numbers are accepted.

Element.Name: Address
Element.Description: The registration address of the legal supplier.

Element.Name: Post location
Element.Description: The post location of a city, town, or village.

Element.Name: Region, province, subentity
Element.Description: The division of a country in which this address is located, such as county, province, region etc.

Element.Name: Country
Element.Description: The country in which this address is situated.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: A code signifying this country, and based on ISO3166-1. The code should be entered for the customer(CustomerParty) and the supplier (SupplierParty), to avoid warning messages from Schematron.

Element.Name: Customer
Element.Description: Denotes the customer.

Element.Name: Customer
Element.Description: Specification of the customer.

Element.Name: Endpoint identifier
Element.Description: An identifier indicating the suppliers electronic address for their messaging. The identifier must be entered as a numerical code according to ISO6523 and consists of one prefix. The prefix specifies the issuer of the identifier, and the actual identifier.

Element.Name: Trader identification
Element.Description: Identifier a trader.

Element.Name: Customer number
Element.Description: Identifies a customer with a number, which can be defined by itself or a unique identification issued by another. Denote the identification number as customer number in the invoice.

Element.Name: Trader name
Element.Description: Must enter trader name.

Element.Name: Name
Element.Description: The supplier's name.

Element.Name: Address
Element.Description: Entering the address.

Element.Name: Address identifier
Element.Description: Identifies a specific address within a system of registered addresses. One should enter the identification system when using this element.

Element.Name: Postbox
Element.Description: A post office box number registered for postal delivery.

Element.Name: Street name
Element.Description: The name of a street or road.

Element.Name: Street number
Element.Description: The number of the street or road.

Element.Name: Post location
Element.Description: The post location of a city, town, or village.

Element.Name: Post number
Element.Description: The postal number for this address.

Element.Name: Region, county, province
Element.Description: The division of a country in which this address is located.

Element.Name: Country
Element.Description: The country in which this address is situated.

Element.Name: Legal trader
Element.Description: Identifies a legal trader through a national register (Brønnøysundregister).

Element.Name: Registration name
Element.Description: The name of the buyer as registered with the relevant legal authority.

Element.Name: Organization number
Element.Description: The customer's organization number.

Element.Name: Address
Element.Description: The registration address of the legal buyer.

Element.Name: Post location
Element.Description: The post location of a city, town, or village.

Element.Name: Region
Element.Description: The division of a country in which this address is located., such as county, province, region etc.

Element.Name: Country
Element.Description: The country in which this address is situated.

Element.Name: Country code
Element.Description: A code signifying this country, and based on ISO3166-1. The code should be entered for the customer(CustomerParty) and the supplier (SupplierParty), to avoid warning messages from Schematron.

Element.Name: Contact information
Element.Description: The buyer's contact information.

Element.Name: Reference
Element.Description: The buyer's reference specified as "Their ref."

Element.Name: Telephone
Element.Description: The buyer's contact information- telephone number.

Element.Name: Telefax
Element.Description: The buyer's contact information- telefax number.

Element.Name: Electronic mail
Element.Description: The buyer's contact information- electronic mail address.

Element.Name: Payment receiver
Element.Description: The payment receiver or trader issue an invoice. Can be a invoice-company.

Element.Name: Trader identifier
Element.Description: Identifies a trader.

Element.Name: ID
Element.Description: Identifies a payment receiver. If including this element, one should enter the identification system.

Element.Name: Trader name
Element.Description: MUST include the trader name.

Element.Name: Name
Element.Description: The payment receiver's name.

Element.Name: Name
Element.Description: Information about the payment.

Element.Name: Payment means type code
Element.Description: The means, expressed as code, for how a payment is expected to be or has been settled.

Element.Name: Payment identifier
Element.Description: Identifies the payment by using means of payment.

Element.Name: Credit transfer
Element.Description: The payee's financial account.

Element.Name: Payment account identifier
Element.Description: Identifies the financial payment account, i.e. the bank account number.

Element.Name: Payment account name
Element.Description: The name of the financial payment account.

Element.Name: Financial institution branch
Element.Description: The branch of the financial institution according to the financial payment account.

Element.Name: Payment service provider identifier
Element.Description: An identifier for the payment service provider where a payment is located.

Element.Name: Payment terms
Element.Description: Payment terms according to invoice.

Element.Name: Note
Element.Description: Textual description of the payment terms.

Element.Name: Tax total
Element.Description: VAT amount per tax rate and total VAT amount.

Element.Name: Total tax
Element.Description: Total amount for specified amount regime. EHF only denotes the VAT amount.

Element.Name: Tax sub total
Element.Description: Specifies tax amount within different VAT rates.

Element.Name: Tax basis
Element.Description: VAT basis to calculate a tax for a given VAT category.

Element.Name: Tax amount
Element.Description: The amount of this tax subtotal.

Element.Name: Tax category
Element.Description: VAT basis to calculate a tax for a given VAT category.

Element.Name: ID
Element.Description: Identifier for tax category.

Element.Name: Tax scheme
Element.Description: The taxation scheme within this tax category.

Element.Name: ID
Element.Description: Identifies the tax scheme.

Element.Name: Monetary total
Element.Description: The total amount payable on the invoice, including allowances, charges and taxes.

Element.Name: Line extension amount
Element.Description: Net of line amount, exclusive VAT.

Element.Name: Payable amount
Element.Description: Total amount to be paid.

Element.Name: Reminder line
Element.Description: A line describing a payment past due.

Element.Name: Line number
Element.Description: Identifies the reminder line.

Element.Name: Note
Element.Description: Free-form text added to reminder line.

Element.Name: Debit line amount
Element.Description: The amount debited on the reminder line.

Element.Name: Credit line amount
Element.Description: The amount credited on the reminder line.

Element.Name: Billing reference
Element.Description: A reference to a billing document associated with the reminder line.

Element.Name: Document reference
Element.Description: Reference to an invoice.

Element.Name: Reference identifier
Element.Description: Identifier for the referenced document.

Element.Name: Document reference
Element.Description: Reference to a credit note.

Element.Name: Reference identifier
Element.Description: Identifier for the referenced credit note document.
